verses.text_uthmani: ٱقْتَرَبَ لِلنَّاسِ حِسَابُهُمْ وَهُمْ فِى غَفْلَةٍ مُّعْرِضُونَ

translations.text: ˹The time of˺ people’s judgment has drawn near, yet they are heedlessly turning away.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Iqtaraba linnasi hisabuhumwahum fee ghaflatin muAAridoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن ذِكْرٍ مِّن رَّبِّهِم مُّحْدَثٍ إِلَّا ٱسْتَمَعُوهُ وَهُمْ يَلْعَبُونَ

translations.text: Whatever new reminder comes to them from their Lord, they only listen to it jokingly,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ma ya/teehim min thikrin minrabbihim muhdathin illa istamaAAoohu wahumyalAAaboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَاهِيَةً قُلُوبُهُمْ ۗ وَأَسَرُّوا۟ ٱلنَّجْوَى ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ هَلْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُكُمْ ۖ أَفَتَأْتُونَ ٱلسِّحْرَ وَأَنتُمْ تُبْصِرُونَ

translations.text: with their hearts ˹totally˺ distracted. The evildoers would converse secretly, ˹saying,˺ “Is this ˹one˺ not human like yourselves? Would you fall for ˹this˺ witchcraft, even though you can ˹clearly˺ see?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Lahiyatan quloobuhum waasarroo annajwaallatheena thalamoo hal hatha illabasharun mithlukum afata/toona assihra waantum tubsiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ رَبِّى يَعْلَمُ ٱلْقَوْلَ فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ

translations.text: The Prophet responded, “My Lord ˹fully˺ knows every word spoken in the heavens and the earth. For He is the All-Hearing, All-Knowing.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala rabbee yaAAlamu alqawla fee assama-iwal-ardi wahuwa assameeAAu alAAaleem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: بَلْ قَالُوٓا۟ أَضْغَـٰثُ أَحْلَـٰمٍۭ بَلِ ٱفْتَرَىٰهُ بَلْ هُوَ شَاعِرٌ فَلْيَأْتِنَا بِـَٔايَةٍ كَمَآ أُرْسِلَ ٱلْأَوَّلُونَ

translations.text: Yet they say, “This ˹Quran˺ is a set of confused dreams! No, he has fabricated it! No, he must be a poet! So let him bring us a ˹tangible˺ sign like those ˹prophets˺ sent before.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Bal qaloo adghathu ahlaminbali iftarahu bal huwa shaAAirun falya/tinabi-ayatin kama orsila al-awwaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مَآ ءَامَنَتْ قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْيَةٍ أَهْلَكْنَـٰهَآ ۖ أَفَهُمْ يُؤْمِنُونَ

translations.text: Not a ˹single˺ society We destroyed before them ever believed ˹after receiving the signs˺. Will these ˹pagans˺ then believe?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ma amanat qablahum min qaryatinahlaknaha afahum yu/minoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَا قَبْلَكَ إِلَّا رِجَالًا نُّوحِىٓ إِلَيْهِمْ ۖ فَسْـَٔلُوٓا۟ أَهْلَ ٱلذِّكْرِ إِن كُنتُمْ لَا تَعْلَمُونَ

translations.text: We did not send ˹messengers˺ before you ˹O Prophet˺ except mere men inspired by Us. If you ˹polytheists˺ do not know ˹this already˺, then ask those who have knowledge ˹of the Scriptures˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama arsalna qablaka illarijalan noohee ilayhim fas-aloo ahla aththikriin kuntum la taAAlamoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا جَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ جَسَدًا لَّا يَأْكُلُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ خَـٰلِدِينَ

translations.text: We did not give those messengers ˹supernatural˺ bodies that did not need food, nor were they immortal.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama jaAAalnahum jasadan laya/kuloona attaAAama wama kanookhalideen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ صَدَقْنَـٰهُمُ ٱلْوَعْدَ فَأَنجَيْنَـٰهُمْ وَمَن نَّشَآءُ وَأَهْلَكْنَا ٱلْمُسْرِفِينَ

translations.text: Then We fulfilled Our promise to them, saving them along with whoever We willed and destroying the transgressors.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma sadaqnahumu alwaAAdafaanjaynahum waman nashao waahlaknaalmusrifeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَقَدْ أَنزَلْنَآ إِلَيْكُمْ كِتَـٰبًا فِيهِ ذِكْرُكُمْ ۖ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ

translations.text: We have surely revealed to you a Book, in which there is glory for you. Will you not then understand?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Laqad anzalna ilaykum kitabanfeehi thikrukum afala taAAqiloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَكَمْ قَصَمْنَا مِن قَرْيَةٍ كَانَتْ ظَالِمَةً وَأَنشَأْنَا بَعْدَهَا قَوْمًا ءَاخَرِينَ

translations.text: ˹Imagine˺ how many societies of wrongdoers We have destroyed, raising up other people after them!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wakam qasamna min qaryatin kanatthalimatan waansha/na baAAdahaqawman akhareen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَمَّآ أَحَسُّوا۟ بَأْسَنَآ إِذَا هُم مِّنْهَا يَرْكُضُونَ

translations.text: When the wrongdoers sensed ˹the arrival of˺ Our torment, they started to run away from their cities.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Falamma ahassoo ba/sanaitha hum minha yarkudoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَا تَرْكُضُوا۟ وَٱرْجِعُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ مَآ أُتْرِفْتُمْ فِيهِ وَمَسَـٰكِنِكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُسْـَٔلُونَ

translations.text: ˹They were told,˺ “Do not run away! Return to your luxuries and your homes, so you may be questioned ˹about your fate˺.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: La tarkudoo warjiAAooila ma otriftum feehi wamasakinikumlaAAallakum tus-aloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰوَيْلَنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَـٰلِمِينَ

translations.text: They cried, “Woe to us! We have surely been wrongdoers.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo ya waylana innakunna thalimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَمَا زَالَت تِّلْكَ دَعْوَىٰهُمْ حَتَّىٰ جَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ حَصِيدًا خَـٰمِدِينَ

translations.text: They kept repeating their cry until We mowed them down, ˹leaving them˺ lifeless.<sup foot_note=76963>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fama zalat tilka daAAwahumhatta jaAAalnahum haseedan khamideen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا لَـٰعِبِينَ

translations.text: We did not create the heavens and the earth and everything in between for sport.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama khalaqna assamaawal-arda wama baynahuma laAAibeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَوْ أَرَدْنَآ أَن نَّتَّخِذَ لَهْوًا لَّٱتَّخَذْنَـٰهُ مِن لَّدُنَّآ إِن كُنَّا فَـٰعِلِينَ

translations.text: Had We intended to take ˹some˺ amusement, We could have found it in Our presence, if that had been Our Will.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Law aradna an nattakhithalahwan lattakhathnahu min ladunna inkunna faAAileen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: بَلْ نَقْذِفُ بِٱلْحَقِّ عَلَى ٱلْبَـٰطِلِ فَيَدْمَغُهُۥ فَإِذَا هُوَ زَاهِقٌ ۚ وَلَكُمُ ٱلْوَيْلُ مِمَّا تَصِفُونَ

translations.text: In fact, We hurl the truth against falsehood, leaving it crushed, and it quickly vanishes. And woe be to you for what you claim!<sup foot_note=76964>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Bal naqthifu bilhaqqiAAala albatili fayadmaghuhu fa-itha huwa zahiqunwalakumu alwaylu mimma tasifoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَهُۥ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَمَنْ عِندَهُۥ لَا يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ عَنْ عِبَادَتِهِۦ وَلَا يَسْتَحْسِرُونَ

translations.text: To Him belong all those in the heavens and the earth. And those nearest to Him are not too proud to worship Him, nor do they tire.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walahu man fee assamawatiwal-ardi waman AAindahu la yastakbiroonaAAan AAibadatihi wala yastahsiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يُسَبِّحُونَ ٱلَّيْلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ لَا يَفْتُرُونَ

translations.text: They glorify ˹Him˺ day and night, never wavering.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yusabbihoona allayla wannaharala yafturoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوٓا۟ ءَالِهَةً مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ هُمْ يُنشِرُونَ

translations.text: Or have they taken gods from the earth, who can raise the dead?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ami ittakhathoo alihatan minaal-ardi hum yunshiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَوْ كَانَ فِيهِمَآ ءَالِهَةٌ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ لَفَسَدَتَا ۚ فَسُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَرْشِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ

translations.text: Had there been other gods besides Allah in the heavens or the earth, both ˹realms˺ would have surely been corrupted. So Glorified is Allah, Lord of the Throne, far above what they claim.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Law kana feehima alihatunilla Allahu lafasadata fasubhana Allahirabbi alAAarshi AAamma yasifoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَا يُسْـَٔلُ عَمَّا يَفْعَلُ وَهُمْ يُسْـَٔلُونَ

translations.text: He cannot be questioned about what He does, but they will ˹all˺ be questioned.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: La yus-alu AAamma yafAAaluwahum yus-aloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ ءَالِهَةً ۖ قُلْ هَاتُوا۟ بُرْهَـٰنَكُمْ ۖ هَـٰذَا ذِكْرُ مَن مَّعِىَ وَذِكْرُ مَن قَبْلِى ۗ بَلْ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ ٱلْحَقَّ ۖ فَهُم مُّعْرِضُونَ

translations.text: Or have they taken other gods besides Him? Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Show ˹me˺ your proof. Here is ˹the Quran,˺ the Reminder for those with me; along with ˹earlier Scriptures,˺ the Reminder for those before me.”<sup foot_note=76965>1</sup> But most of them do not know the truth, so they turn away.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ami ittakhathoo min doonihi alihatanqul hatoo burhanakum hatha thikru manmaAAiya wathikru man qablee bal aktharuhum layaAAlamoona alhaqqa fahum muAAridoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَا مِن قَبْلِكَ مِن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا نُوحِىٓ إِلَيْهِ أَنَّهُۥ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنَا۠ فَٱعْبُدُونِ

translations.text: We never sent a messenger before you ˹O Prophet˺ without revealing to him: “There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Me, so worship Me ˹alone˺.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama arsalna min qablika minrasoolin illa noohee ilayhi annahu la ilahailla ana faAAbudoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالُوا۟ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَلَدًا ۗ سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥ ۚ بَلْ عِبَادٌ مُّكْرَمُونَ

translations.text: And they say, “The Most Compassionate has offspring!”<sup foot_note=76966>1</sup> Glory be to Him! In fact, those ˹angels˺ are only ˹His˺ honoured servants,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqaloo ittakhatha arrahmanuwaladan subhanahu bal AAibadun mukramoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَا يَسْبِقُونَهُۥ بِٱلْقَوْلِ وَهُم بِأَمْرِهِۦ يَعْمَلُونَ

translations.text: who do not speak until He has spoken, ˹only˺ acting at His command.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: La yasbiqoonahu bilqawliwahum bi-amrihi yaAAmaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَعْلَمُ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْ وَلَا يَشْفَعُونَ إِلَّا لِمَنِ ٱرْتَضَىٰ وَهُم مِّنْ خَشْيَتِهِۦ مُشْفِقُونَ

translations.text: He ˹fully˺ knows what is ahead of them and what is behind them. They do not intercede except for whom He approves, and they tremble in awe of Him.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: YaAAlamu ma bayna aydeehim wamakhalfahum wala yashfaAAoona illa limani irtadawahum min khashyatihi mushfiqoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ وَمَن يَقُلْ مِنْهُمْ إِنِّىٓ إِلَـٰهٌ مِّن دُونِهِۦ فَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِيهِ جَهَنَّمَ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ

translations.text: Whoever of them were to say, “I am a god besides Him,” they would be rewarded with Hell by Us. This is how We reward the wrongdoers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waman yaqul minhum innee ilahun mindoonihi fathalika najzeehi jahannama kathalikanajzee aththalimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَوَلَمْ يَرَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ كَانَتَا رَتْقًا فَفَتَقْنَـٰهُمَا ۖ وَجَعَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلْمَآءِ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ حَىٍّ ۖ أَفَلَا يُؤْمِنُونَ

translations.text: Do the disbelievers not realize that the heavens and earth were ˹once˺ one mass then We split them apart? And We created from water every living thing. Will they not then believe?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Awa lam yara allatheenakafaroo anna assamawati wal-ardakanata ratqan fafataqnahuma wajaAAalnamina alma-i kulla shay-in hayyin afalayu/minoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَجَعَلْنَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ رَوَٰسِىَ أَن تَمِيدَ بِهِمْ وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا فِجَاجًا سُبُلًا لَّعَلَّهُمْ يَهْتَدُونَ

translations.text: And We have placed firm mountains upon the earth so it does not shake with them, and made in it broad pathways so they may find their way.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WajaAAalna fee al-ardi rawasiyaan tameeda bihim wajaAAalna feeha fijajansubulan laAAallahum yahtadoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَجَعَلْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ سَقْفًا مَّحْفُوظًا ۖ وَهُمْ عَنْ ءَايَـٰتِهَا مُعْرِضُونَ

translations.text: And We have made the sky a well-protected canopy, still they turn away from its signs.<sup foot_note=76968>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WajaAAalna assamaasaqfan mahfoothan wahum AAan ayatihamuAAridoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلَّيْلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ وَٱلشَّمْسَ وَٱلْقَمَرَ ۖ كُلٌّ فِى فَلَكٍ يَسْبَحُونَ

translations.text: And He is the One Who created the day and the night, the sun and the moon—each travelling in an orbit.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wahuwa allathee khalaqa allayla wannaharawashshamsa walqamara kullun fee falakin yasbahoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا جَعَلْنَا لِبَشَرٍ مِّن قَبْلِكَ ٱلْخُلْدَ ۖ أَفَإِي۟ن مِّتَّ فَهُمُ ٱلْخَـٰلِدُونَ

translations.text: We have not granted immortality to any human before you ˹O Prophet˺: so if you die, will they live forever?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama jaAAalna libasharin minqablika alkhulda afa-in mitta fahumu alkhalidoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كُلُّ نَفْسٍ ذَآئِقَةُ ٱلْمَوْتِ ۗ وَنَبْلُوكُم بِٱلشَّرِّ وَٱلْخَيْرِ فِتْنَةً ۖ وَإِلَيْنَا تُرْجَعُونَ

translations.text: Every soul will taste death. And We test you ˹O humanity˺ with good and evil as a trial, then to Us you will ˹all˺ be returned.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kullu nafsin tha-iqatu almawtiwanablookum bishsharri walkhayri fitnatanwa-ilayna turjaAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِذَا رَءَاكَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ إِن يَتَّخِذُونَكَ إِلَّا هُزُوًا أَهَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى يَذْكُرُ ءَالِهَتَكُمْ وَهُم بِذِكْرِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ هُمْ كَـٰفِرُونَ

translations.text: When the disbelievers see you ˹O Prophet˺, they only make fun of you, ˹saying,˺ “Is this the one who speaks ˹ill˺ of your gods?” while they disbelieve at the mention of the Most Compassionate.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-itha raaka allatheenakafaroo in yattakhithoonaka illa huzuwan ahathaallathee yathkuru alihatakum wahum bithikriarrahmani hum kafiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: خُلِقَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ مِنْ عَجَلٍ ۚ سَأُو۟رِيكُمْ ءَايَـٰتِى فَلَا تَسْتَعْجِلُونِ

translations.text: Humankind is made of haste. I will soon show you My signs, so do not ask Me to hasten them.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Khuliqa al-insanu min AAajalinsaoreekum ayatee fala tastaAAjiloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ

translations.text: They ask ˹the believers˺, “When will this threat come to pass if what you say is true?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wayaqooloona mata hathaalwaAAdu in kuntum sadiqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَوْ يَعْلَمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ حِينَ لَا يَكُفُّونَ عَن وُجُوهِهِمُ ٱلنَّارَ وَلَا عَن ظُهُورِهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ

translations.text: If only the disbelievers knew that a time will come when they will not be able to keep the Fire off their faces or backs, nor will they be helped.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Law yaAAlamu allatheena kafaroo heenala yakuffoona AAan wujoohihimu annara walaAAan thuhoorihim wala hum yunsaroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: بَلْ تَأْتِيهِم بَغْتَةً فَتَبْهَتُهُمْ فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ رَدَّهَا وَلَا هُمْ يُنظَرُونَ

translations.text: In fact, the Hour will take them by surprise, leaving them stunned. So they will not be able to avert it, nor will it be delayed from them.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Bal ta/teehim baghtatan fatabhatuhum falayastateeAAoona raddaha wala hum yuntharoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدِ ٱسْتُهْزِئَ بِرُسُلٍ مِّن قَبْلِكَ فَحَاقَ بِٱلَّذِينَ سَخِرُوا۟ مِنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ

translations.text: ˹Other˺ messengers had already been ridiculed before you ˹O Prophet˺, but those who mocked them were overtaken by what they used to ridicule.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqadi istuhzi-a birusulin min qablika fahaqabillatheena sakhiroo minhum ma kanoobihi yastahzi-oon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ مَن يَكْلَؤُكُم بِٱلَّيْلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ مِنَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۗ بَلْ هُمْ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّهِم مُّعْرِضُونَ

translations.text: Ask ˹them, O  Prophet,˺ “Who can defend you by day or by night against the Most Compassionate?” Still they turn away from the remembrance of their Lord.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul man yaklaokum billayli wannaharimina arrahmani bal hum AAan thikrirabbihim muAAridoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ لَهُمْ ءَالِهَةٌ تَمْنَعُهُم مِّن دُونِنَا ۚ لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ نَصْرَ أَنفُسِهِمْ وَلَا هُم مِّنَّا يُصْحَبُونَ

translations.text: Or do they have gods—other than Us—that can protect them? They cannot ˹even˺ protect themselves, nor will they be aided against Us.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am lahum alihatun tamnaAAuhum mindoonina la yastateeAAoona nasraanfusihim wala hum minna yushaboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: بَلْ مَتَّعْنَا هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ وَءَابَآءَهُمْ حَتَّىٰ طَالَ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْعُمُرُ ۗ أَفَلَا يَرَوْنَ أَنَّا نَأْتِى ٱلْأَرْضَ نَنقُصُهَا مِنْ أَطْرَافِهَآ ۚ أَفَهُمُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبُونَ

translations.text: In fact, We have allowed enjoyment for these ˹Meccans˺ and their forefathers for such a long time ˹that they took it for granted˺. Do they not see that We gradually reduce ˹their˺ land from its borders? Is it they who will then prevail?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Bal mattaAAna haola-iwaabaahum hatta talaAAalayhimu alAAumuru afala yarawna anna na/teeal-arda nanqusuha min atrafihaafahumu alghaliboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أُنذِرُكُم بِٱلْوَحْىِ ۚ وَلَا يَسْمَعُ ٱلصُّمُّ ٱلدُّعَآءَ إِذَا مَا يُنذَرُونَ

translations.text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I warn you only by revelation.” But the deaf cannot hear the call when they are warned!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul innama onthirukum bilwahyiwala yasmaAAu assummu adduAAaaitha ma yuntharoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَئِن مَّسَّتْهُمْ نَفْحَةٌ مِّنْ عَذَابِ رَبِّكَ لَيَقُولُنَّ يَـٰوَيْلَنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَـٰلِمِينَ

translations.text: If they were touched by even a breath of your Lord’s torment, they would certainly cry, “Woe to us! We have really been wrongdoers.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wala-in massat-hum nafhatun min AAathabirabbika layaqoolunna ya waylana inna kunnathalimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَنَضَعُ ٱلْمَوَٰزِينَ ٱلْقِسْطَ لِيَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ فَلَا تُظْلَمُ نَفْسٌ شَيْـًٔا ۖ وَإِن كَانَ مِثْقَالَ حَبَّةٍ مِّنْ خَرْدَلٍ أَتَيْنَا بِهَا ۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِنَا حَـٰسِبِينَ

translations.text: We set up the scales of justice for the Day of Judgment, so no soul will be wronged in the least. And ˹even˺ if a deed is the weight of a mustard seed, We will bring it forth. And sufficient are We as a ˹vigilant˺ Reckoner.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WanadaAAu almawazeena alqistaliyawmi alqiyamati fala tuthlamunafsun shay-an wa-in kana mithqala habbatinmin khardalin atayna biha wakafa binahasibeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَىٰ وَهَـٰرُونَ ٱلْفُرْقَانَ وَضِيَآءً وَذِكْرًا لِّلْمُتَّقِينَ

translations.text: Indeed, We granted Moses and Aaron the decisive authority—a light and a reminder for the righteous,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad atayna moosawaharoona alfurqana wadiyaan wathikranlilmuttaqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلْغَيْبِ وَهُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّاعَةِ مُشْفِقُونَ

translations.text: who are in awe of their Lord without seeing Him,<sup foot_note=76969>1</sup> and are fearful of the Hour.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Allatheena yakhshawna rabbahum bilghaybiwahum mina assaAAati mushfiqoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَهَـٰذَا ذِكْرٌ مُّبَارَكٌ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ ۚ أَفَأَنتُمْ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ

translations.text: And this ˹Quran˺ is a blessed reminder which We have revealed. Will you ˹pagans˺ then deny it?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wahatha thikrun mubarakunanzalnahu afaantum lahu munkiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَآ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ رُشْدَهُۥ مِن قَبْلُ وَكُنَّا بِهِۦ عَـٰلِمِينَ

translations.text: And indeed, We had granted Abraham sound judgment early on, for We knew him well ˹to be worthy of it˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad atayna ibraheemarushdahu min qablu wakunna bihi AAalimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِۦ مَا هَـٰذِهِ ٱلتَّمَاثِيلُ ٱلَّتِىٓ أَنتُمْ لَهَا عَـٰكِفُونَ

translations.text: ˹Remember˺ when he questioned his father and his people, “What are these statues to which you are so devoted?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ith qala li-abeehi waqawmihi mahathihi attamatheelu allatee antum lahaAAakifoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ وَجَدْنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا لَهَا عَـٰبِدِينَ

translations.text: They replied, “We found our forefathers worshipping them.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo wajadna abaanalaha AAabideen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ لَقَدْ كُنتُمْ أَنتُمْ وَءَابَآؤُكُمْ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ

translations.text: He responded, “Indeed, you and your forefathers have been clearly astray.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala laqad kuntum antum waabaokumfee dalalin mubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوٓا۟ أَجِئْتَنَا بِٱلْحَقِّ أَمْ أَنتَ مِنَ ٱللَّـٰعِبِينَ

translations.text: They asked, “Have you come to us with the truth, or is this a joke?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo aji/tana bilhaqqiam anta mina allaAAibeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ بَل رَّبُّكُمْ رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ٱلَّذِى فَطَرَهُنَّ وَأَنَا۠ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكُم مِّنَ ٱلشَّـٰهِدِينَ

translations.text: He replied, “In fact, your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, Who created them ˹both˺. And to that I bear witness.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala bal rabbukum rabbu assamawatiwal-ardi allathee fatarahunna waanaAAala thalikum mina ashshahideen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَتَٱللَّهِ لَأَكِيدَنَّ أَصْنَـٰمَكُم بَعْدَ أَن تُوَلُّوا۟ مُدْبِرِينَ

translations.text: ˹Then he said to himself,˺ “By Allah! I will surely plot against your idols after you have turned your backs and gone away.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Watallahi laakeedanna asnamakumbaAAda an tuwalloo mudbireen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَجَعَلَهُمْ جُذَٰذًا إِلَّا كَبِيرًا لَّهُمْ لَعَلَّهُمْ إِلَيْهِ يَرْجِعُونَ

translations.text: So he smashed them into pieces, except the biggest of them, so they might turn to it ˹for answers˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: FajaAAalahum juthathan illakabeeran lahum laAAallahum ilayhi yarjiAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ مَن فَعَلَ هَـٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَآ إِنَّهُۥ لَمِنَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ

translations.text: They protested, “Who dared do this to our gods? It must be an evildoer!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo man faAAala hatha bi-alihatinainnahu lamina aththalimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ سَمِعْنَا فَتًى يَذْكُرُهُمْ يُقَالُ لَهُۥٓ إِبْرَٰهِيمُ

translations.text: Some said, “We heard a young man, called Abraham, speaking ˹ill˺ of them.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo samiAAna fatan yathkuruhumyuqalu lahu ibraheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ فَأْتُوا۟ بِهِۦ عَلَىٰٓ أَعْيُنِ ٱلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَشْهَدُونَ

translations.text: They demanded, “Bring him before the eyes of the people, so that they may witness ˹his trial˺.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo fa/too bihi AAalaaAAyuni annasi laAAallahum yashhadoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوٓا۟ ءَأَنتَ فَعَلْتَ هَـٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَا يَـٰٓإِبْرَٰهِيمُ

translations.text: They asked, “Was it you who did this to our gods, O  Abraham?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo aanta faAAalta hatha bi-alihatinaya ibraheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ بَلْ فَعَلَهُۥ كَبِيرُهُمْ هَـٰذَا فَسْـَٔلُوهُمْ إِن كَانُوا۟ يَنطِقُونَ

translations.text: He replied ˹sarcastically˺, “No, this one—the biggest of them—did it! So ask them, if they can talk!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala bal faAAalahu kabeeruhum hathafas-aloohum in kanoo yantiqoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَرَجَعُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ فَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّكُمْ أَنتُمُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ

translations.text: So they came back to their senses, saying ˹to one another˺, “You yourselves are truly the wrongdoers!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: FarajaAAoo ila anfusihim faqalooinnakum antumu aththalimoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ نُكِسُوا۟ عَلَىٰ رُءُوسِهِمْ لَقَدْ عَلِمْتَ مَا هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ يَنطِقُونَ

translations.text: Then they ˹quickly˺ regressed to their ˹original˺ mind-set, ˹arguing,˺ “You already know that those ˹idols˺ cannot talk.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma nukisoo AAala ruoosihim laqadAAalimta ma haola-i yantiqoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ أَفَتَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَنفَعُكُمْ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا يَضُرُّكُمْ

translations.text: He rebuked ˹them˺, “Do you then worship—instead of Allah—what can neither benefit nor harm you in any way?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala afataAAbudoona min dooni Allahima la yanfaAAukum shay-an wala yadurrukum
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أُفٍّ لَّكُمْ وَلِمَا تَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ

translations.text: Shame on you and whatever you worship instead of Allah! Do you not have any sense?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Offin lakum walima taAAbudoona mindooni Allahi afala taAAqiloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ حَرِّقُوهُ وَٱنصُرُوٓا۟ ءَالِهَتَكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ فَـٰعِلِينَ

translations.text: They concluded, “Burn him up to avenge your gods, if you must act.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo harriqoohu wansurooalihatakum in kuntum faAAileen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْنَا يَـٰنَارُ كُونِى بَرْدًا وَسَلَـٰمًا عَلَىٰٓ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ

translations.text: We ordered, “O fire! Be cool and safe for Abraham!”<sup foot_note=76970>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qulna ya naru kooneebardan wasalaman AAala ibraheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَرَادُوا۟ بِهِۦ كَيْدًا فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمُ ٱلْأَخْسَرِينَ

translations.text: They had sought to harm him, but We made them the worst losers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waaradoo bihi kaydan fajaAAalnahumual-akhsareen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُ وَلُوطًا إِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ ٱلَّتِى بَـٰرَكْنَا فِيهَا لِلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

translations.text: Then We delivered him, along with Lot, to the land We had showered with blessings for all people.<sup foot_note=76971>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wanajjaynahu walootan ilaal-ardi allatee barakna feeha lilAAalameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُۥٓ إِسْحَـٰقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ نَافِلَةً ۖ وَكُلًّا جَعَلْنَا صَـٰلِحِينَ

translations.text: And We blessed him with Isaac ˹as a son˺ and Jacob ˹as a grandson˺, as an additional favour—making all of them righteous.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wawahabna lahu ishaqawayaAAqooba nafilatan wakullan jaAAalna saliheen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ أَئِمَّةً يَهْدُونَ بِأَمْرِنَا وَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَيْهِمْ فِعْلَ ٱلْخَيْرَٰتِ وَإِقَامَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَإِيتَآءَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةِ ۖ وَكَانُوا۟ لَنَا عَـٰبِدِينَ

translations.text: We ˹also˺ made them leaders, guiding by Our command, and inspired them to do good deeds, establish prayer, and pay alms-tax. And they were devoted to Our worship.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WajaAAalnahum a-immatan yahdoonabi-amrina waawhayna ilayhim fiAAla alkhayratiwa-iqama assalati wa-eetaa azzakatiwakanoo lana AAabideen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلُوطًا ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ حُكْمًا وَعِلْمًا وَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُ مِنَ ٱلْقَرْيَةِ ٱلَّتِى كَانَت تَّعْمَلُ ٱلْخَبَـٰٓئِثَ ۗ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمَ سَوْءٍ فَـٰسِقِينَ

translations.text: And to Lot We gave wisdom and knowledge, and delivered him from the society engrossed in shameful practices. They were certainly an evil, rebellious people.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walootan ataynahu hukmanwaAAilman wanajjaynahu mina alqaryati allatee kanattaAAmalu alkhaba-itha innahum kanoo qawma saw-in fasiqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَدْخَلْنَـٰهُ فِى رَحْمَتِنَآ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ

translations.text: And We admitted him into Our mercy, ˹for˺ he was truly one of the righteous.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waadkhalnahu fee rahmatinainnahu mina assaliheen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَنُوحًا إِذْ نَادَىٰ مِن قَبْلُ فَٱسْتَجَبْنَا لَهُۥ فَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُ وَأَهْلَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلْكَرْبِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ

translations.text: And ˹remember˺ when Noah had cried out to Us earlier, so We responded to him and delivered him and his family<sup foot_note=76972>1</sup> from the great distress.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wanoohan ith nadamin qablu fastajabna lahu fanajjaynahuwaahlahu mina alkarbi alAAatheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَنَصَرْنَـٰهُ مِنَ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمَ سَوْءٍ فَأَغْرَقْنَـٰهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ

translations.text: And We made him prevail over those who had rejected Our signs. They were truly an evil people, so We drowned them all.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wanasarnahu mina alqawmi allatheenakaththaboo bi-ayatina innahum kanooqawma saw-in faaghraqnahum ajmaAAeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَدَاوُۥدَ وَسُلَيْمَـٰنَ إِذْ يَحْكُمَانِ فِى ٱلْحَرْثِ إِذْ نَفَشَتْ فِيهِ غَنَمُ ٱلْقَوْمِ وَكُنَّا لِحُكْمِهِمْ شَـٰهِدِينَ

translations.text: And ˹remember˺ when David and Solomon passed judgment regarding the crops ruined ˹at night˺ by someone’s sheep, and We were witness to their judgments.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wadawooda wasulaymana ithyahkumani fee alharthi ith nafashatfeehi ghanamu alqawmi wakunna lihukmihim shahideen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَفَهَّمْنَـٰهَا سُلَيْمَـٰنَ ۚ وَكُلًّا ءَاتَيْنَا حُكْمًا وَعِلْمًا ۚ وَسَخَّرْنَا مَعَ دَاوُۥدَ ٱلْجِبَالَ يُسَبِّحْنَ وَٱلطَّيْرَ ۚ وَكُنَّا فَـٰعِلِينَ

translation.text: And We gave understanding of it

translations.text: We guided ˹young˺ Solomon to a fairer settlement,<sup foot_note=76973>1</sup> and granted each of them wisdom and knowledge. We subjected the mountains as well as the birds to hymn ˹Our praises˺ along with David. It is We Who did ˹it all˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fafahhamnaha sulaymanawakullan atayna hukman waAAilman wasakhkharnamaAAa dawooda aljibala yusabbihna wattayrawakunna faAAileen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَعَلَّمْنَـٰهُ صَنْعَةَ لَبُوسٍ لَّكُمْ لِتُحْصِنَكُم مِّنۢ بَأْسِكُمْ ۖ فَهَلْ أَنتُمْ شَـٰكِرُونَ

translations.text: We taught him the art of making body armour to protect you in battle. Will you then be grateful?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WaAAallamnahu sanAAatalaboosin lakum lituhsinakum min ba/sikum fahal antum shakiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلِسُلَيْمَـٰنَ ٱلرِّيحَ عَاصِفَةً تَجْرِى بِأَمْرِهِۦٓ إِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ ٱلَّتِى بَـٰرَكْنَا فِيهَا ۚ وَكُنَّا بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَـٰلِمِينَ

translations.text: And to Solomon We subjected the raging winds, blowing by his command to the land We had showered with blessings. It is We Who know everything.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walisulaymana arreehaAAasifatan tajree bi-amrihi ila al-ardiallatee barakna feeha wakunna bikullishay-in AAalimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمِنَ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينِ مَن يَغُوصُونَ لَهُۥ وَيَعْمَلُونَ عَمَلًا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَكُنَّا لَهُمْ حَـٰفِظِينَ

translations.text: And ˹We subjected˺ some jinn<sup foot_note=76974>1</sup> that dived for him,<sup foot_note=76975>2</sup> and performed other duties. It is We Who kept them in check.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wamina ashshayateeni manyaghoosoona lahu wayaAAmaloona AAamalan doona thalikawakunna lahum hafitheen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ وَأَيُّوبَ إِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّى مَسَّنِىَ ٱلضُّرُّ وَأَنتَ أَرْحَمُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ

translations.text: And ˹remember˺ when Job cried out to his Lord, “I have been touched with adversity,<sup foot_note=76976>1</sup> and You are the Most Merciful of the merciful.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waayyooba ith nadarabbahu annee massaniya addurru waanta arhamuarrahimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱسْتَجَبْنَا لَهُۥ فَكَشَفْنَا مَا بِهِۦ مِن ضُرٍّ ۖ وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ أَهْلَهُۥ وَمِثْلَهُم مَّعَهُمْ رَحْمَةً مِّنْ عِندِنَا وَذِكْرَىٰ لِلْعَـٰبِدِينَ

translations.text: So We answered his prayer and removed his adversity, and gave him back his family, twice as many, as a mercy from Us and a lesson for the ˹devoted˺ worshippers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fastajabna lahu fakashafnama bihi min durrin waataynahu ahlahuwamithlahum maAAahum rahmatan min AAindina wathikralilAAabideen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِسْمَـٰعِيلَ وَإِدْرِيسَ وَذَا ٱلْكِفْلِ ۖ كُلٌّ مِّنَ ٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ

translations.text: And ˹remember˺ Ishmael, Enoch, and Ⱬul-Kifl.<sup foot_note=76977>1</sup> They were all steadfast.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-ismaAAeela wa-idreesa wathaalkifli kullun mina assabireen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَدْخَلْنَـٰهُمْ فِى رَحْمَتِنَآ ۖ إِنَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ

translations.text: We admitted them into Our mercy, for they were truly of the righteous.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waadkhalnahum fee rahmatinainnahum mina assaliheen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَذَا ٱلنُّونِ إِذ ذَّهَبَ مُغَـٰضِبًا فَظَنَّ أَن لَّن نَّقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ فَنَادَىٰ فِى ٱلظُّلُمَـٰتِ أَن لَّآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنتَ سُبْحَـٰنَكَ إِنِّى كُنتُ مِنَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ

translations.text: And ˹remember˺ when the Man of the Whale stormed off ˹from his city˺ in a rage, thinking We would not restrain him.<sup foot_note=76978>1</sup> Then in the ˹veils of˺ darkness<sup foot_note=76979>2</sup> he cried out, “There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except You. Glory be to You! I have certainly done wrong.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Watha annooni ith thahabamughadiban fathanna an lan naqdira AAalayhifanada fee aththulumatian la ilaha illa anta subhanaka inneekuntu mina aththalimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱسْتَجَبْنَا لَهُۥ وَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُ مِنَ ٱلْغَمِّ ۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُـۨجِى ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

translations.text: So We answered his prayer and rescued him from anguish. And so do We save the ˹true˺ believers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fastajabna lahu wanajjaynahumina alghammi wakathalika nunjee almu/mineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَزَكَرِيَّآ إِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥ رَبِّ لَا تَذَرْنِى فَرْدًا وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلْوَٰرِثِينَ

translations.text: And ˹remember˺ when Zachariah cried out to his Lord, “My Lord! Do not leave me childless, though You are the Best of Successors.”<sup foot_note=76980>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wazakariyya ith nadarabbahu rabbi la tatharnee fardan waanta khayru alwaritheen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱسْتَجَبْنَا لَهُۥ وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُۥ يَحْيَىٰ وَأَصْلَحْنَا لَهُۥ زَوْجَهُۥٓ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ يُسَـٰرِعُونَ فِى ٱلْخَيْرَٰتِ وَيَدْعُونَنَا رَغَبًا وَرَهَبًا ۖ وَكَانُوا۟ لَنَا خَـٰشِعِينَ

translations.text: So We answered his prayer, granted him John, and made his wife fertile. Indeed, they used to race in doing good, and call upon Us with hope and fear, totally humbling themselves before Us.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fastajabna lahu wawahabnalahu yahya waaslahna lahuzawjahu innahum kanoo yusariAAoona fee alkhayratiwayadAAoonana raghaban warahaban wakanoo lanakhashiAAeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلَّتِىٓ أَحْصَنَتْ فَرْجَهَا فَنَفَخْنَا فِيهَا مِن رُّوحِنَا وَجَعَلْنَـٰهَا وَٱبْنَهَآ ءَايَةً لِّلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

translations.text: And ˹remember˺ the one who guarded her chastity, so We breathed into her through Our angel, ˹Gabriel,˺<sup foot_note=76981>1</sup> making her and her son a sign for all peoples.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallatee ahsanat farjahafanafakhna feeha min roohinawajaAAalnaha wabnaha ayatanlilAAalameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦٓ أُمَّتُكُمْ أُمَّةً وَٰحِدَةً وَأَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمْ فَٱعْبُدُونِ

translations.text: ˹O prophets!˺ Indeed, this religion of yours is ˹only˺ one, and I am your Lord, so worship Me ˹alone˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna hathihi ommatukum ommatan wahidatanwaana rabbukum faoAAbudoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَتَقَطَّعُوٓا۟ أَمْرَهُم بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ كُلٌّ إِلَيْنَا رَٰجِعُونَ

translations.text: Yet the people have divided it into sects. But to Us they will all return.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WataqattaAAoo amrahum baynahum kullunilayna rajiAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَهُوَ مُؤْمِنٌ فَلَا كُفْرَانَ لِسَعْيِهِۦ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ كَـٰتِبُونَ

translations.text: So whoever does good and is a believer will never be denied ˹the reward for˺ their striving, for We are recording it all.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faman yaAAmal mina assalihatiwahuwa mu/minun fala kufrana lisaAAyihi wa-innalahu katiboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَحَرَٰمٌ عَلَىٰ قَرْيَةٍ أَهْلَكْنَـٰهَآ أَنَّهُمْ لَا يَرْجِعُونَ

translations.text: It is impossible for a society which We have destroyed to ever rise again,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waharamun AAalaqaryatin ahlaknaha annahum la yarjiAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا فُتِحَتْ يَأْجُوجُ وَمَأْجُوجُ وَهُم مِّن كُلِّ حَدَبٍ يَنسِلُونَ

translations.text: until ˹after˺ Gog and Magog have broken loose ˹from the barrier˺,<sup foot_note=76982>1</sup> swarming down from every hill,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hatta itha futihatya/jooju wama/jooju wahum min kulli hadabin yansiloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱقْتَرَبَ ٱلْوَعْدُ ٱلْحَقُّ فَإِذَا هِىَ شَـٰخِصَةٌ أَبْصَـٰرُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ يَـٰوَيْلَنَا قَدْ كُنَّا فِى غَفْلَةٍ مِّنْ هَـٰذَا بَلْ كُنَّا ظَـٰلِمِينَ

translations.text: ushering in the True Promise.<sup foot_note=76983>1</sup> Then—behold!—the disbelievers will stare ˹in horror, crying,˺ “Oh, woe to us! We have truly been heedless of this. In fact, we have been wrongdoers.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqtaraba alwaAAdu alhaqqufa-itha hiya shakhisatun absaru allatheenakafaroo ya waylana qad kunna fee ghaflatinmin hatha bal kunna thalimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّكُمْ وَمَا تَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ حَصَبُ جَهَنَّمَ أَنتُمْ لَهَا وَٰرِدُونَ

translations.text: Certainly you ˹disbelievers˺ and whatever you worship instead of Allah will be the fuel of Hell.<sup foot_note=76984>1</sup> You are ˹all˺ bound to enter it.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innakum wama taAAbudoona min dooniAllahi hasabu jahannama antum laha waridoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَوْ كَانَ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ ءَالِهَةً مَّا وَرَدُوهَا ۖ وَكُلٌّ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ

translations.text: Had those idols been ˹true˺ gods, they would not have entered it. And they will be there forever.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Law kana haola-i alihatanma waradooha wakullun feeha khalidoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَهُمْ فِيهَا زَفِيرٌ وَهُمْ فِيهَا لَا يَسْمَعُونَ

translations.text: In it they will groan, and will not be able to hear.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Lahum feeha zafeerun wahum feehala yasmaAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ سَبَقَتْ لَهُم مِّنَّا ٱلْحُسْنَىٰٓ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ عَنْهَا مُبْعَدُونَ

translations.text: Surely those for whom We have destined the finest reward will be kept far away from Hell,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna allatheena sabaqat lahum minnaalhusna ola-ika AAanha mubAAadoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَا يَسْمَعُونَ حَسِيسَهَا ۖ وَهُمْ فِى مَا ٱشْتَهَتْ أَنفُسُهُمْ خَـٰلِدُونَ

translations.text: not even hearing the slightest hissing from it. And they will delight forever in what their souls desire.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: La yasmaAAoona haseesahawahum fee ma ishtahat anfusuhum khalidoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَا يَحْزُنُهُمُ ٱلْفَزَعُ ٱلْأَكْبَرُ وَتَتَلَقَّىٰهُمُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ هَـٰذَا يَوْمُكُمُ ٱلَّذِى كُنتُمْ تُوعَدُونَ

translations.text: The Supreme Horror ˹of that Day˺ will not disturb them, and the angels will greet them, ˹saying,˺ “This is your Day, which you have been promised.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: La yahzunuhumu alfazaAAual-akbaru watatalaqqahumu almala-ikatu hathayawmukumu allathee kuntum tooAAadoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَ نَطْوِى ٱلسَّمَآءَ كَطَىِّ ٱلسِّجِلِّ لِلْكُتُبِ ۚ كَمَا بَدَأْنَآ أَوَّلَ خَلْقٍ نُّعِيدُهُۥ ۚ وَعْدًا عَلَيْنَآ ۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا فَـٰعِلِينَ

translations.text: On that Day We will roll up the heavens like a scroll of writings. Just as We produced the first creation, ˹so˺ shall We reproduce it. That is a promise binding on Us. We truly uphold ˹Our promises˺!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yawma natwee assamaakatayyi assijlli lilkutubi kama bada/naawwala khalqin nuAAeeduhu waAAdan AAalayna innakunna faAAileen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ كَتَبْنَا فِى ٱلزَّبُورِ مِنۢ بَعْدِ ٱلذِّكْرِ أَنَّ ٱلْأَرْضَ يَرِثُهَا عِبَادِىَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحُونَ

translations.text: Surely, following the ˹heavenly˺ Record, We decreed in the Scriptures: “My righteous servants shall inherit the land.”<sup foot_note=76985>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad katabna fee azzaboorimin baAAdi aththikri anna al-arda yarithuhaAAibadiya assalihoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ فِى هَـٰذَا لَبَلَـٰغًا لِّقَوْمٍ عَـٰبِدِينَ

translations.text: Surely this ˹Quran˺ is sufficient ˹as a reminder˺ for those devoted to worship.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna fee hatha labalaghanliqawmin AAabideen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَـٰكَ إِلَّا رَحْمَةً لِّلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

translations.text: We have sent you ˹O Prophet˺ only as a mercy for the whole world.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama arsalnaka illa rahmatanlilAAalameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ إِنَّمَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَىَّ أَنَّمَآ إِلَـٰهُكُمْ إِلَـٰهٌ وَٰحِدٌ ۖ فَهَلْ أَنتُم مُّسْلِمُونَ

translations.text: Say, “What has been revealed to me is this: ‘Your God is only One God.’ Will you then submit?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul innama yooha ilayya annamailahukum ilahun wahidun fahal antummuslimoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَإِن تَوَلَّوْا۟ فَقُلْ ءَاذَنتُكُمْ عَلَىٰ سَوَآءٍ ۖ وَإِنْ أَدْرِىٓ أَقَرِيبٌ أَم بَعِيدٌ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ

translations.text: If they turn away, then say, “I have warned you all equally. I do not know if what you are threatened with is near or far.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fa-in tawallaw faqul athantukum AAalasawa-in wa-in adree aqareebun am baAAeedun matooAAadoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّهُۥ يَعْلَمُ ٱلْجَهْرَ مِنَ ٱلْقَوْلِ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا تَكْتُمُونَ

translations.text: Allah surely knows what you say openly and whatever you hide.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innahu yaAAlamu aljahra mina alqawliwayaAAlamu ma taktumoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنْ أَدْرِى لَعَلَّهُۥ فِتْنَةٌ لَّكُمْ وَمَتَـٰعٌ إِلَىٰ حِينٍ

translations.text: I do not know if this ˹delay˺ is possibly a test for you and an enjoyment for a while.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-in adree laAAallahu fitnatun lakum wamataAAunila heen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَـٰلَ رَبِّ ٱحْكُم بِٱلْحَقِّ ۗ وَرَبُّنَا ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ ٱلْمُسْتَعَانُ عَلَىٰ مَا تَصِفُونَ

translation.text: the One Whose help is sought

translations.text: ˹In the end,˺ the Prophet said, “My Lord! Judge ˹between us˺ in truth. And our Lord is the Most Compassionate, Whose help is sought against what you claim.”<sup foot_note=76986>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala rabbi ohkum bilhaqqiwarabbuna arrahmanu almustaAAanuAAala ma tasifoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
